title: Autonomous Google Car Hits Public Bus During Test Drive
summary: A self-driving car being tested by Google struck a public bus on a city street in Mountain View, Calif.

title: Cryptography Pioneers Win Turing Award
summary: In the 1970s, Whitfield Diffie and Martin E. Hellman invented the technology that underpins web commerce.

title: Tenure Voting Could Shift the Balance of Corporate Power
summary: A system that awards more votes the longer shares are held would empower shareholders and balance the interests of management and activists.

summary: As our online networks of friends have grown and the social media companies have matured, feeds are evolving, too.

summary: The move reflects a shift in prioritization of Mr. Doerr’s time from managing the firm to grooming its next generation of leaders.

summary: Even if you did not download the music to your iOS device from the iTunes store, you can still take it along on your mobile gadget.

summary: The investors GV, formerly Google Ventures, and Kapor Capital provided the financing for the office cleaning and management company.
